Why Choose ORPIX ?

Omni-Channel Communication
Across Popular Platforms


Effortlessly manage customer conversations from various channels, including WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, Line, and Telegram, all within one intuitive platform. Orpix.io ensures you never miss an important customer.

WhatsApp Business API
with META Business Verification


Unlock the full potential of WhatsApp Business API with business verification from META. Gain trust and credibility with your customers by using the verified badge, enabling secure and reliable communication for your company.

with Real-Time Responses

Frequently Asked Questions

What messaging platforms can I integrate with Orpix.io?

We support all major platforms, including WhatApp, Facebook Messenger, Line, Telegram and more...

How can Orpix.io improve my customer service?

Our Omni-Channel Chat Solution ensures all customer inquiries from different platforms are centralized in one system, allowing for faster responses and better management.

Isn Orpix WhatsApp API verified by META?

Yes, our WhatsApp Business API includes META Business Verification, providing added trust and credibility to your customer communications.

How much does Orpix cost?

We offer a range of competitive pricing plans tailored to suit businesses of all sizes. Contact us for a customized quote.
